followReason: to be up to date to our journey in this big challenge.
descriptionOne: Euge, or EuGENIA is two years old, and recently she was diagnostic with Neuroblastoma phase 4 with high risk. Her parents say to her that she is a GENIA because how she is dealing with the tretment.
descriptionTwo: We have a long way to get over this disease, the first phase is in Uruguay and the second phase durate 6 months in Spain, with a complementary immunotherapy treatment.
descriptionThree: The cost of the second phase of the treatment are really high and they are over 250.000 USD
descriptionFour: Her parents, family and friends are doing this campaing to recolect the money for the treatment and overcome this challenge. Euge is being a GENIA, you can help her!
